title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 28 April 2015 - XWiki

13:39 <lucaa> has quit  
13:43 <woshilapin> has quit  
14:02 <KermitTheFragger> hi all  
14:03 <KermitTheFragger> im trying to run a remote Solr instance but i can't find the docs anywhere  
14:03 <KermitTheFragger> i can find some 4.5 release notes which state there should be an attachment in the search app config wich has all the solr stuff needed (schema.xml and such) but in 6.3 it isn't there anymore  
14:34 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
14:47 <ClemensR> KermitTheFragger: Solr config should be in ${environment.permanentDirectory}/solr/xwiki/conf/schema.xml  now  
14:48 <KermitTheFragger> ClemensR: ah thanks, ill take a look there  
14:54 <tmortagne> KermitTheFragger: see http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotesXWiki64#HSolrserversetuppackage, you can either use the Debian package or download the version you need on http://maven.xwiki.org/releases/org/xwiki/platform/xwiki-platform-search-solr-server-data/  
14:54 <tmortagne> I tough there was not doc more detailed than the release note but I must have forgotten  
14:56 <KermitTheFragger> tmortagne: thanks i'll also take a look at that  
14:56 <KermitTheFragger> updating tot the lasted 6.X release seems to be the smartest first step though  
15:02 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
15:14 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
15:14 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
15:14 <DarkKnightCZ> cjd: Hi, i was wondering, how is the websocket extension cluster-aware? i.e. if there is multinode environment and one client connects to first-server:8093 and second connects to second-server:8093  
15:15 <cjd> it is not cluster aware  
15:19 <DarkKnightCZ> okay, i will make a little patch for it :)  
15:20 <cjd> And I will be ready to take your pull req, that sounds like a most interesting improvement! https://github.com/xwiki-contrib/xwiki-contrib-websocket  
15:22 <DarkKnightCZ> yup... i still have to think about the cluster modifications, but that has some security issues with my settings (one floating IP adress), so i will add just possibility to not-fail if address binding fails... then node with the correct IP adress will handle all requests, thus avoiding inconsistency and websocket.externalPath will ensure all clients connect to the correct server  
15:25 <gsmeria> has quit  
15:27 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
15:43 <Enygma`> has quit  
15:44 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
15:45 <ClemensR> has left #xwiki  
15:50 <DarkKnightCZ> cjd: don't you know, if i add websocket jar into lib folder, will it replace the extension-updater version?  
15:54 <cjd> it will not, both will end up being loaded and it will be a mess  
15:54 <cjd> but if you do a `find ./ -name '\*websocket\*jar' then replace that file, it will be ok  
15:56 <DarkKnightCZ> great, thanks... i wasn't sure how exactly does the EM work  
16:11 <tmortagne> actually it depends what the jar you put in lib forlder contains, if EM can identify it as extension with id "extensionid" it won't load any installed extension matching this id  
16:11 <tmortagne> s/forlder/folder/  
16:11 <tmortagne> (and it will warn about this conflict)  
16:11 <tmortagne> (DarkKnightCZ )  
16:12 <msmeria> has quit  
16:12 <DarkKnightCZ> tmortagne: thanks  
16:12 <tmortagne> right now EM search for maven pom in jar it can find in the classloader to identify core extensions and for all the jar it could not identify it look at other jars dependencies  
16:18 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
16:33 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
16:33 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
16:35 <DarkKnightCZ> cjd: okay, so either NettyWebSocketService.userByKeyWiki creation has to be distributed across cluster, or the key generation has to be changed (i.e. with some strong cipher), otherwise users will get 401 from different nodes... i will try the cipher solution tomorrow as i'm worried the jgroups distribution won't be that fast  
16:36 <Enygma`> has quit  
16:36 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
16:38 <cjd> DarkKnightCZ: +1 re jgroups, perhaps it could be tested?  
16:38 <lucaa> has quit  
16:40 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
16:42 <DarkKnightCZ> sure
